avdta.project

Class DTAProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.project.Project
      • avdta.project.TransitProject
        • avdta.project.DemandProject
          • avdta.project.DTAProject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CDTAProject, FourStepProject

    public class DTAProject
extends DemandProject
    This project represents a DTA network, which extends TransitProject and adds demand data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      DTAProject()

      • DTAProject

        public DTAProject(java.io.File directory)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs the project from the specified directory. This reads the project and constructs the associated DTASimulator.
        Parameters:
        directory - the project directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file is not found

      • openAssignment

        public void openAssignment(java.io.File file)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Opens an Assignment from the given Assignment folder and assigns vehicles as specified. This calls DTASimulator.loadAssignment(avdta.dta.Assignment). To obtain data about the Assignment, call Simulator.simulate().
        Parameters:
        file - the assignment directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file cannot be accessed
